articles.author: Amanda Musa
articles.title: Long-term use of certain reflux medications is associated with a higher risk of dementia, study suggests - CNN
articles.description: Millions of Americans take medications known as proton pump inhibitors every day to treat heartburn and acid reflux, and in recent years, these drugs, also known as PPIs, have been linked to a greater risk of kidney failure, stroke, and early death from any c…
